name: Black Olive and Goat Cheese Croustade
author: LindsayOlives
summary: Let store-bought pizza dough make you look like a kitchen pro! A delicious spread of Lindsay® Black Ripe Pitted Olives and sauteed leeks, topped with goat cheese and fresh herbs, make for impressive party fare without the fuss.
ingredients: ¼ cup Lindsay® Black Ripe Pitted Olives, diced
directions: Heat butter in a small saute pan over medium heat
Add leeks and cook for 3-4 minutes until soft
Remove from heat and stir in olives
Cut pizza dough into 20 (1/2 ounce) pieces
Shape into 2-inch circles and place on a lightly greased parchment lined baking sheet
Bake in a 400 degree oven for 7-8 minutes
Remove from oven and spread each disk with olive mixture
Top with goat cheese and bake for an additional 5-7 minutes at 400 degrees
Sprinkle with fresh herbs just before serving
